item.description: Resume/CV Summary Strategically focused data-engineering manager with a track record of implementing large data systems while being technically competent to deal with implementation details. Proven ability to lead multiple high-profile projects simultaneously. Adept at working across teams in order to take usersâ€™ requirements and turn them into working systems. Experience 2/2022 - Present Chief Data Architect Stellantis: Remote from Tampa Bay, FL I lead international teams that enable world-class data products to create the future of mobility in connected vehicles.
